meanings.sent1: The rain helped diminish the fire's intensity.
meanings.sent2: I hope the noise will diminish soon.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to diminish the size of the elephant.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the shadows began to diminish into darkness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's praise never failed to diminish my worries.

meanings.definition: Decrease in size, extent, or importance.
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy can help diminish your waistline.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to diminish its workforce to cut costs.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's powers started to diminish after the battle.
meanings.sent4: The impact of her words seemed to diminish with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the garden did not diminish with the changing seasons.
